trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There was one other sighting in Chicago on or around November 25th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sleeping around 2 Am and I heard a loud buzzing noize so I ran outside. It was pitch black except for a huge arrow shaped figure in the sky.It hovered for a while directly above me. So I called my friend and she lives on my street and heard it too so ran down to my house.She was really frightened and said I should report it to mufon. We ran inside to get a camera but when we returned it was pitch black and nothing was in the sky.
Summary: Huge shaped like a missile. Hovered around for about 3 minutes and disappered. I showed my friend and she went balistic and she said I should report it to mufon.
